body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To John B Lindsey Dr.

row.cell: For services rendered in assisting in the organization of the Militia of the State during the time from 18th ^day of^ May until June 1st 1864

body.p: The Quarter Master General is ordered to pay this acct. out of the Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Inspector Quarter-Master, Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 31st of May, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Thirty Eight Dollars, and Eighty Eight Cents, in full of the above account.
